name: Soul Harvester - LD52
description:
Soul Harvester - LD52 About

Survive from monster waves as long as possible by shooting them down and harvesting their souls. Use those souls to become more powerful.

Note: This game does not have any audio.

A submission for Ludum Dare 52, which had harvest as the theme. The game was made under 72 hours.

Keys/Instructions
  • Shoot - Left click
  • Walk - WASD 
  • Aim - Mouse
  • Open menu/shop - Q
  • Harvest- E
Credits
  • A* pathfinding
  • Glowberry, color palette
